dmca.title: DMCA Violation
dmca.body:
Please note that the URLs referenced in your DMCA notice do not reside
within our network as of 10:28:43 a.m. (GMT-6) on September 5, 2006.
 
Legal Response Team
The Planet
 

-----Original Message-----
From: Jeremy Mueller [mailto:century@gmail.com] 
Posted At: Friday, September 01, 2006 4:44 PM
Posted To: Legal Response
Conversation: DMCA Violation
Subject: DMCA Violation


Your customer, ShuffleandCut.com has taken the following images from
TheTournamentFaction.com and used them on their site.  They are being
used to promote their services and that use has not been authourized by
me, the copyright holder for said scans.
